sql: SELECT t1.id_empresa, t1.nombre, t1.direccion, t2.nombre as nombre_empleado, t2.correo as correo_empleado, t2.telefono as telefono_empleado, t2.url_imagen as imagen_empleado, t3.id_empleado, t3.dia_semana, t3.hora_inicio, t3.hora_fin, t3.fecha_creacion FROM empresa AS t1 INNER JOIN empleado AS t2 ON t1.id_empresa = t2.id_empresa INNER JOIN turno AS t3 ON t2.id_empleado = t3.id_empleado WHERE id_usuario IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array(?, ',')::int[])) AND t2.activo IS true;
